data.title: Kentucky Derby 2016: Winners from 1875 through 2016
data.meta_description: Here is a list of the Kentucky Derby winners from 1875 through 2016
data.text:
Here is a list of every Kentucky Derby winner from the very first winner in 1875 through this year's champion from 2016.

They are some of the legendary names in the sport of horse racing, including Secretariat, Smarty Jones and yes, American Pharoah. Twelve of these great horses went on to win the Triple Crown.

Will that feat be repeated in 2016?

MORE KENTUCKY DERBY: Coverage of 2016 race
